hotels.title: Modern Manor in Historic Stratford-upon-Avon
hotels.description: Discover a luxurious modern retreat in the heart of Shakespeare country at the Stratford Manor in rural Warwickshire. Let the buzz of city life melt away the moment you step foot in this elegant hideaway, where you'll enjoy the use of a pristine indoor swimming pool, 22 acres of manicured gardens, and a heavenly day spa. When hunger strikes, The Shakespeare Restaurant serves up mouthwatering fine-dining meals, while for a more casual affair, head to The Terrace Bar for a drink or a refined Afternoon Tea (additional cost). A mere five minutes from Stratford Manor is the historic birthplace of William Shakespeare, Stratford-upon-Avon. Spend days exploring: see a show at the Royal Shakespeare company, visit Shakespeare's birthplace, stroll around Mary Arden’s Farm and browse independent shops and boutiques in the centre of the town.

hotels.title: Stylish Stratford-upon-Avon Stay Opposite Shakespeare's Last Home
hotels.description: Bask in the energy of Stratford-upon-Avon's vibrant Elizabethan history with a stay at Hotel Indigo Stratford-upon-Avon, an IHG Hotel, a modern city gem that will put you right in the heart of the birthplace of Shakespeare. An abundance of restaurants, shops, trendy bars and iconic sights are within easy reach, and the hotel's modern facilities include a traditional ‘field to fork’ British pub, exquisite private garden, library and fitness centre - making this the perfect place for an exciting break.

hotels.title: UK Stylish Stratford-upon-Avon Riverside Escape
hotels.description: There’s no better launchpad to your Shakespeare quest than the centrally located Crowne Plaza Stratford Upon Avon, an IHG Hotel, a stylish escape resting beside the River Avon. Wander through time in this Tudor town in search of tearooms, or witness magic at the Royal Shakespeare Company. Return to the Riverside Restaurant & Terrace and toast to the Bard with a sultry tipple or sink into a sumptuous meal, as you slip into quaint country life.
